From: RoboRick007 <rfa007@...>

::Hot Rod::

He back flips away from the shots. After the dust from the explosian
clears he is standing there.
"I can defeat you, I've done it before. I dont need the Matrix. And good
Autobot or Maximal with a spark the beats good and true can defeat you.
We dont sweat scum."
He fired of two missiles at Unicron.

::Dollon::

He is hit, and his body is destroyed. His spark goes to the Matrix, or
the Pit as the Predacons call it.

::DrillBit::

"Dollon!!!!!! No!!"
He is hit but not sevearly. He takes cover behind some scrap, shooting
two optic shots at Unitron.
"DarkFate, I'm ok, but we have lost Dollon."
